title: Arsenal FC jersey
content:
Hi, can anyone tell me which font is used for Fly Emirates on the Arsenal jersey? Thanks in advance.

jason

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20091201072630im_/http:/typophile.com/files/arsenal_4783.gif)
author: jasonf

comments.content: I believe this is Fly Emerites’ own custom typeface. I’ve looked for this before and came up empty.
Thanks Stephen. Is there a similar alternative?
It’s a struggle. The closest I can get is [Clearface Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20091201072630/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/monotype/clearface_gothic_std_ot/).
To me, Jos Buivenga’s [Fontin](http://web.archive.org/web/20091201072630/http:/www.josbuivenga.demon.nl/fontin.html) has quite a similar feeling—yet, it’s not really close. Then again it’s free.
